author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-93.66 Pct Of Emperia Shares Subscribed For In Tender
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - EMPERIA HOLDING SA
* FOLLOWING THE TENDER OF MAXIMA GRUPE FOR THE COMPANYâ€™S SHARES, 11.6 MILLION OF SHARES REPRESENTING 93.66 PCT OF SHARE CAPITAL HAVE BEEN SUBSCRIBED FOR, MAXIMA SAYS ON THURSDAY
* MAXIMA GRUPE ANNOUNCED TENDER OFFER FOR 12,342,027 SHARES OF EMPERIA HOLDING IN NOV. 2017
